combat.atkFormula: Atk = Weapon Might + STR/MAG + combat bonuses
combat.asFormula: AS = SPD - max(Weapon Wt - floor(STR / 5), 0) + SPD bonuses
combat.doublingRule: Double attack if your AS is at least foe AS + 5
combat.effectiveDamageRule: Effective weapons deal 3x damage vs matching move type

legendaryWeapons.name: Fortify
legendaryWeapons.special: Heals all allies in range, MAG + 5 HP

legendaryWeapons.name: Soulreaver
legendaryWeapons.special: Drains HP equal to damage dealt

featuredAffixes.name: Shielded
featuredAffixes.description: First hit each player phase deals 0 damage

featuredAffixes.name: Thorns
featuredAffixes.description: Reflects 25% of melee damage taken back to attacker

featuredAffixes.name: Teleporter
featuredAffixes.description: After taking damage, warps to a random passable tile within 3 spaces

featuredAffixes.name: Regenerator
featuredAffixes.description: Heals 20% max HP at start of enemy phase

featuredAffixes.name: Waller
featuredAffixes.description: At start of enemy phase, spawns a temporary Wall tile on a random adjacent empty tile (lasts 2 turns)

featuredAffixes.name: Deathburst
featuredAffixes.description: On death, deals 5 damage to all units within 1 tile

featuredAffixes.name: Venomous
featuredAffixes.description: All attacks inflict 5 poison damage after combat

featuredAffixes.name: Corrosive
featuredAffixes.description: Attacks reduce target DEF by 2 for the rest of battle (stacks)

rules.promotedMastery: Promoted units gain Mast rank in all currently held weapon proficiencies.
rules.forecastAs: Forecast AS is full effective combat speed and should include active combat bonuses.
